name: Yo! Noid 4: Episode 3
storyline:
One day, when out looking for Pizza to steal, The Noid stumbles upon his favourite Vocaloid and Domino's Pizza spokesperson, Hatsune Miku! Plucking up the courage to ask for her autograph - and maybe some vouchers - he realises she's murdered a small blue rodent creature and turned his skin into a Onesie!

This could be a PR Nightmare for Domino's Pizza!

The Noid speeds off after Hatsune Miku, and discovers her dastardly plot to send Domino's Pizza into ruin.

He meets Pepe the Pepperoni, who is looking for a champion to help save his home, The Domino's Pizza Planet - where all the Domino's Pizzas are made - As Hatsume Miku has taken over and is forcing everyone to put Pineapple on all the pizzas!

Eventually, the pair enter one of Domino's magic teleporting Ovens and arrive on The Domino's Pizza Planet, ready to stop Hatsune Miku once and for all!
summary:
The Noid is back in the long-awaited final episode of Yo Noid 4.

The Noid, and his Sidekick Pepe the Pepperoni, journey to Pepe's home planet: The Domino's Pizza Planet, to save it from enslavement from an insane Hatsune Miku who is threatening to put pineapple on every pizza.

This game is pulled from a world where Domino's Pizza's mascot "The Noid" became the hit platforming sensation rather than Sonic the Hedgehog. Including having Yo! Noid 4 having it's third episode released!
